text: Can be great. They did get my sauce wrong and when I got home I gave it to my daughter without knowing it had the wrong sauce. Her mouth was burning after her first bite. Although they corrected it by bringing me another pizza, she refuses to ever eat pizza again.

text: Awesome experience. We had a great meal. The salad bar was very appetizing and offered 99% of what I like. I'm partial to hard boiled eggs with my salad, which were not available. However, the cottage cheese was delicious. The pizza was not â€¦More

text: I ordered a super supreme pizza and was told it will deliver in 30 minutes. I called back hour later and was told I do not know anything about your order. We did not take it. Only two of us here. I checked and was charged on my card and then credited. SORRY WAY TO DO BUSINESS! I gave it a 1 because they are no options for choosing 0.

name: Tricia Smith
text: I waited a year to go back to this particular Pizza Hut. Lets just put it this way....no amount of time can make up for this last pick up. The pizza was undercooked and definitely didn't have the xtra cheese i ordered. The manager refused â€¦More

name: Genia Herring
text: Have option of dine in, take out or carry out and delivery. If you dine in you have option at lunch time to have the buffet, which is very good! Consisting of salads, breadsticks, pizza, pastas and desert such as desert pizzas, pudding, jello. This may also be available at supper. Friendly atmosphere.
